effect.x_y: Changes the target to pure water-type until it leaves the field. If the target has multitype, this move will fail.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Changes the target to pure water-type until it leaves the field. If the target has multitype, this move will fail.

short_effect.x_y: Changes the target’s type to Water.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Changes the target’s type to Water.

flavor_text.x_y: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target’s type to Water.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target’s type to Water.
